Container.Name: rtorrent-rutorrent
Container.DonateText: Want to contribute? Support crazy-max for his Awesome container!

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: The container need this to set the correct time for logs and scheduled tasks. You can find your timezone here: https://timezonedb.com/time-zones

Config.Name: PUID (Process User ID)
Config.Description: This is the identity of the user and it sets the permissions acordingly for files and folders.

Config.Name: PGID (Process Group ID)
Config.Description: This is the identity of the group the user is in and then sets permissions acordingly.

Config.Name: WAN IP
Config.Description: Public IP address reported to the tracker (auto if empty)

Config.Name: WAN IP CMD
Config.Description: Command to resolve the Public IP address

Config.Name: Memory Limit
Config.Description: PHP memory limit (default 256M)

Config.Name: Upload Max Size
Config.Description: Upload max size (default 16M)

Config.Name: Clear Environment
Config.Description: Clear environment in FPM workers (default yes)

Config.Name: PHP OpCache mem size
Config.Description: PHP OpCache memory consumption (default 128)

Config.Name: Max file uploads
Config.Description: The maximum number of files allowed to be uploaded simultaneously (default 50)

Config.Name: Authentication Delay
Config.Description: The time in seconds to wait for Basic Auth (default 0s)

Config.Name: Trusted IP's from
Config.Description: Trusted addresses that are known to send correct replacement addresses (default 0.0.0.0/32)

Config.Name: Real IP Header
Config.Description: Request header field whose value will be used to replace the client address (default X-Forwarded-For)

Config.Name: LOG IP VAR
Config.Description: Use another variable to retrieve the remote IP address for access log_format on Nginx. (default remote_addr)

Config.Name: Log Access
Config.Description: Output access log (default true)

Config.Name: XMLRPC Auth Message
Config.Description: XMLRPC_AUTHBASIC_STRING: Message displayed during validation of XMLRPC Basic Auth (default rTorrent XMLRPC restricted access)

Config.Name: XMLRPC Port
Config.Description: XMLRPC port through nginx over SCGI socket (default 8000)

Config.Name: XMLRPC Size Limit
Config.Description: Maximum body size of XMLRPC calls (default 1M)

Config.Name: ruTorrent Auth Message
Config.Description: Message displayed during validation of ruTorrent Basic Auth (default ruTorrent restricted access)

Config.Name: WebDav Auth Message
Config.Description: Message displayed during validation of WebDAV Basic Auth (default WebDAV restricted access)

Config.Name: WebDav Port
Config.Description: WebDAV port on completed downloads (default 9000)

Config.Name: rTorrent Log Level
Config.Description: rTorrent log level (default info)

Config.Name: rTorrent Log
Config.Description: Log executed commands to /data/rtorrent/log/execute.log (default false)

Config.Name: XMLRPC Log
Config.Description: Log XMLRPC queries to /data/rtorrent/log/xmlrpc.log (default false)

Config.Name: DHT UDP Port
Config.Description: DHT UDP port (dht.port.set, default 6881)

Config.Name: rTorrent Incomming Port
Config.Description: Incoming connections (network.port_range.set, default 50000)

Config.Name: Remove ruTorrent Plugins
Config.Description: Remove ruTorrent core plugins ; comma separated (default erasedata,httprpc)

Config.Name: ruTorrent HTTP user agent
Config.Default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:12.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/12.0
Config.Description: ruTorrent HTTP user agent (default Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:12.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/12.0)

Config.Name: ruTorrent HTTP Timeout
Config.Description: ruTorrent HTTP timeout in seconds (default 30)

Config.Name: ruTorrent use HTTP GZip
Config.Description: Use HTTP Gzip compression (default true)

Config.Name: ruTorrent RPC timeout
Config.Description: ruTorrent RPC timeout in seconds (default 5)

Config.Name: ruTorrent RPC calls
Config.Description: Log ruTorrent RPC calls (default false)

Config.Name: ruTorrent RPC faults
Config.Description: Log ruTorrent RPC faults (default true)

Config.Name: PHP Gzip compression
Config.Description: Use PHP Gzip compression (default false)

Config.Name: Gzip compression level
Config.Description: PHP Gzip compression level (default 2)

Config.Name: Rand for scheduler
Config.Description: Rand for schedulers start, +0..X seconds (default 10)

Config.Name: ruTorrent Log file
Config.Description: ruTorrent log file path for errors messages (inside the container) (default /data/rutorrent/rutorrent.log)

Config.Name: ruTorrent diagnostics
Config.Description: ruTorrent diagnostics like permission checking (default true)

Config.Name: Save added torrents
Config.Description: Save torrents files added via ruTorrent in /data/rutorrent/share/torrents (inside the container) (default true)

Config.Name: Override added torrents
Config.Description: Existing .torrent files will be overwritten (default false)

Config.Name: Disable user settings
Config.Description: If true, allows for single user style configuration, even with webauth (default false)

Config.Name: ruTorrent Locale
Config.Description: Set default locale for ruTorrent (default UTF8)

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: rTorrent / ruTorrent config, session files, log, etc.

Config.Name: Downloads
Config.Description: Downloaded files

Config.Name: Passwd
Config.Description: Contains htpasswd files for basic auth

Config.Name: ruTorrent Port
Config.Description: ruTorrent HTTP port (default 8080)
